description: This data set is a list of daily vehicle counts, in each direction, taken at the weigh-in-motion (WIM) stations operated by the New York State Department of Transportation (NYSDOT).  Daily totals by direction are provided, as well as totals in each of 13 vehicle-type classes, and latitude-longitude locations of each station.

metadata.attribution: New York State Department of Transportation (DOT)

name: Weigh-In-Motion Station Vehicle Traffic Counts: Beginning 2013
